attributes.action: Put pressure on governments who violate human rights with regard to care homes and institutions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to petition our Prime Minister and his cabinet to pressure the international community to stop the abuse and total inhumanity that exists within care homes and institutions in countries such as Serbia and Bulgaria.  These 'homes' are beyond words and the suffering is not something that could possibly be tolerated. Their abuse is tantamount to murder! Please add your support to stop them suffering and bring justice for those that cannot be heard.
